entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS You morons can't even keep COVID-19 out of the White House. We've all been isolating, distancing, wearing masks while you idiots carry on business-as-usual. Wake the h*ll up! Resign so we can have somebody with  judgment and leadership get us out of this mess.
